title: Can you bring back auto-lock in ranked?
body:
So I'm used to the old system of picking a champ and then waiting for the clock to count down in-case there is a last minute team comp switch.
But now if you dont lock in you are kicked from lobby. bruh
Ive lost like 19lp already, i know you guys tryna make champ select faster and all but it shouldnt kick you if youve selected a champion and just havent clicked the lock in button...

replies.body:
It's not about saving time, but to keep people engaged in champion select. It's to prevent things like AFKs making it into game, forgetting to change runes/masteries/summoners and to generally keep the team communicating with one another. If you aren't paying attention and you aren't ready to play then NCS won't let you.

Hope I explained why well enough, it shouldn't take too long to get used to locking in. I'd recommend keeping the popup that reminds you when you get in if you are worried about forgetting and if you haven't already gotten rid of it.

When it's your turn to pick/ban League will tab you back over to the client over most things too, so if you really want to alt tab, then just make sure you confirm your pick/ban before tabbing back out.
No they can't , 'couse they don't give two actual shits about their players anyways .
Wouldn't be as bad if it didn't take so long to register. More than a full second to register that you've changed your Champion and even longer when clicking the lock in/ban buttons.

> GET BUFF(ERED) New champ select should feel more forgiving when locking in picks and bans with less than a second to spare
